title: Photostat, "Elevations, Right and Left Lateral Façades, Castel d'Orgeval, Parc Beausejour, near Paris", 1904
signed: Signed on lower right of left design and lower right of right design in black ink: PARIS LE  SEPTEMBER 1904/ ARCHITECTE/ Hector Guimard
inscribed:
On top left in black ink: LE CASTEL D'ORGEVAL AU PARC BEAUSEJOUR/ NO.7/ PROPRIETE DE MR LAURENT/ FACADE LATERALE DROITE 

On top right in black ink: LE CASTEL D'ORGEVAL AU PARC BEAUSEJOUR/ NO.9/ PROPRIETE DE MR LAURENT/ FACADE LATERALE GAUCHE
description: Elevation plans for the Castel d'Orgeval, Parc Beausejour. The design on the left depicts the right side of the building, and the right depicts the left side. Scale is noted throughout both drawings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photostat, "Elevations, Right and Left Lateral Façades, Castel d'Orgeval, Parc Beausejour, near Paris", 1904.
1904. Print on off-white wove paper. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-7.
